input.message: =string.concat("%%%%% Air:BuildDeployDesc %%%%% ProjectID : ", $flow.ProjectID, ", Name : ", $flow.Name, ", ServiceType : ", $flow.ServiceType, ", Image : ", $flow.Image, ", ModelDescriptor : ", string.tostring($flow.ModelDescriptor), ", ScriptSystemEnv : ", string.tostring($flow.ScriptSystemEnv))
=string.concat("%%%%% Air:LogCallLightcraneService %%%%% Request To LightcraneService : RequestBody : ", $flow.RequestBody, ", Properties : ", coerce.toString($flow.Properties))
